texts: Love this energy. Keep it simple: one small win today.
Nice. Protect that moodâ€”don't waste it scrolling.
You're crushing it! Keep this energy close.
That's the spirit. Let's make today count.
Awesome! Keep riding this wave.
This is your superpower. Own it.
It's okay to feel neutral right now. Rest when you need it.
That's normal. Give yourself permission to recharge.
Not every day is high-energy, and that's fine.
Steady pace is still progress. Be gentle with yourself.
Even low-key days matter. You're doing okay.
It's okay to feel low. You're not broken. One small step is enough today.
This feeling is temporary, even if it doesn't feel that way.
You've felt better before, and you will again. Be patient with yourself.
Sadness is human. You're allowed to grieve and rest.
Reach out to someone you trust. You don't have to carry this alone.
Your anger is valid. Take some space if you need it.
Breathe. Let yourself feel it, then let it pass.
Anger tells you something matters. Channel it wisely.
Step away for a bit. You'll see things differently soon.
It's okay to be frustrated. Give yourself permission to feel it.
You're safe right now. Try box breathing: 4 in, hold 4, out 4, hold 4.
Anxiety lies. Notice 5 things you see, 4 you hear, 3 you feel, 2 you smell, 1 you taste.
One moment at a time. You don't have to solve everything today.
Your stress shows you care. But you can't control everything.
Breathe. This feeling will pass. You've survived every anxiety before.
I'm glad you're here. Please reach out to someone you trust. Your life matters.
What you're feeling is real, and you deserve support. Talk to someone today.
You might not see it now, but this will pass. Please reach out for help.
Your pain is valid, but you don't have to face it alone. Call someone who cares.
This is hard, and I see you. Please talk to someone. You matter.
